kw.name: Page Should Contain Text
kw.arg: Playground XYZ Holdings Pty. Ltd., Playground XYZ Australia Pty. Ltd., Playground XYZ IP Pty. Ltd., Playground XYZ EMEA Ltd., Playground XYZ Asia Pte. Ltd. and Playground XYZ North America Corp. and their affiliates (collectively,“[COMPANY],” “we,” “us,” or “our”) adopts this Privacy Statement to comply with the California Consumer Privacy Act of 2018 (“CCPA”) and other California privacy laws. This Privacy Statement applies solely to visitors, users, and others who reside in the State of California (“consumers,” “you,” or “your”).
This Privacy Statement explains our privacy practices and your rights regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of your personal information.
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains `text`.
